name: Spinwheels: 4x4 Extreme Mountain Climb
description:
You dreamed of taking part in off-road racing, but you did not have the opportunity?
Then Spinwheels: 4x4 Extreme Mountain Climb will give it to you! Four SUVs of your choice, each of which has its own unique settings. Ready to become a winner in this race? Then show an excerpt and quick reaction To cope with all the tests. Dangers await at every step. Dangerous mountain slopes, narrow impassable gorges, ruts and windbreaks-each type of terrain has its own effect on the behavior of the machine. The changing of the time of day and the constantly changing weather conditions.It will dive into the game as much as possible full.Sit in the car, start the engine and go!

Features
- Physical engine making the behavior of the machine realistic, depending on the type of terrain
- HD graphics of the new generation, reliable landscape and objects of the environment
- Automobiles-prototypes of really existing, participating in competitions
- Realistic view from the cockpit
- Atmospheric sound.
- The change of time of day and weather conditions
- Ability to switch between three types of gear
- Easy and clear mobile input
-The mode of free ride after passing through all the stages
